abstract_ssm: Contains University-wide, divisional, and departmental organizational charts produced between 1930 and the present day.
corpname_ssm: M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives
M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives
accessrestrict_ssm: Access to this collection is unrestricted
acqinfo_ssm: Images in this collection were digitized from records in the collections of the University Archives and harvested from the websites of University divisions and departments.
arrangement_ssm: This collection has no series, and the contents are arranged chronologically.
bioghist_ssm: Organizational charts in this collection span a wide range of the University's history, from the era of the State College for Teachers (1914-1959) through the various iterations of the State University, culminating in the present day University at Albany.  The organization of the University changes frequently.  Sometimes these changes have been minor: for example, slight changes in department names.  Some of the changes have been more significant: the University has undergone major restructuring at various points in its history.
scopecontent_ssm: Each item in this collection is a PDF image of a different organizational chart. The level of organization varies.  Many of the charts describe the overall organizational structure of the University, while some are specific to certain offices, divisions, or departments.
